meanings.definition: Relating to a particular ethnic group or race.
meanings.sent1: The ethnical clothing showcased the traditions of the tribe.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful ethnical dress to celebrate her heritage.
meanings.sent3: The ethnical festival brought together people from various backgrounds.
meanings.sent4: His ethnical roots ran deep, connecting him to his ancestors.
meanings.sent5: The ethnical music filled the air with the sounds of different cultures.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the study of different cultures and societies.
meanings.sent1: The ethnical studies class explored customs from around the world.
meanings.sent2: She found the ethnical research fascinating and eye-opening.
meanings.sent3: Studying ethnical traditions made him appreciate diversity even more.
meanings.sent4: Her ethnical knowledge helped her understand global perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The ethnical exhibit displayed artifacts from diverse civilizations.

meanings.definition: Characterized by cultural or racial diversity.
meanings.sent1: The ethnical neighborhood was a melting pot of different backgrounds.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed the ethnical cuisine that offered flavors from many cultures.
meanings.sent3: The ethnical community celebrated unity amidst their differences.
meanings.sent4: Her ethnical heritage enriched her life with varied experiences.
meanings.sent5: The ethnical city pulsated with the energy of its diverse population.
